page.title: 20Entertainment for Youngsters
page.content: Entertainment in the Meir area is very limited.There is a Youth Club at Weston Coyney which is only open on Wednesday evenings.You can dance,play games and do lots of other things.It only costs ten pence and provides a great night out. There is also a Youth Club at the local Community Centre on two nights of the week and whilst there are a great number activities to choose from,most people do not go because they feel it is to organised. At Longton High School there is also the Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme on Friday evenings.There are three levels to the award,Bronze,Silver and Gold. Kim Bott
